LiveChatButton.autoGreeting:
All Australia Post employees have the right to be treated with courtesy and respect. Lack of such conduct may lead to termination of your interaction.
Did you know you can request refunds for unused labels from your MyPost Dashboard? From your order, click View, select the label, click View again. You'll see a refund option for eligible labels.
Hi {!LiveAgent_VisitorName}, how can I help you today?
